endpoints.description: Retrieve aggregated statistical data of all monitored renewable energy systems.
Fetch real-time performance data for a specific renewable energy system identified by ID.
Create a new predictive maintenance alert for a specific energy system.
List all active alerts related to monitored energy sources, categorized by type.
Update configuration settings for a specific energy system.
Obtain the integration status of all energy systems with power grids.
Send a dispatch command to integrate renewable energy into the grid.
Run a simulation of potential energy production under specified conditions.
Remove a specific renewable energy system from monitoring.
Query the maintenance history for a specific renewable energy system.
